definitions: the activity of promoting the sale of goods, especially by their presentation in retail outlets

examples.text: problems rooted in overexpansion and poor merchandising

shortDefinitions: activity of promoting sale of goods

definitions: branded products used to promote a particular movie, popular music group, etc., or linked to a particular fictional character

examples.text: the characters are still popular and found on a wide variety of merchandising

shortDefinitions: products used to promote film, pop group, etc.
